version_description:
- We’ve been working behind the scenes to fix bugs and enhance performance, so the app runs smoother than ever.

Love the Macy’s app? Rate it now to let us know! Questions or comments? Contact us at customerservice@macys.com & we’re happy to help.

- Love it? Snap it! Take a pic using the Macy’s app—even of an item in our catalog—and shop for it instantly. Just look for the camera icon on the homepage to get started!
- We’ve made it easier than ever to spot our Last Act items, so you can always get the best deal.
- Lists just got better! Now you can access, sort and share all of your lists in a tap.

Love the Macy’s app? Rate it now to let us know! Questions or comments? Contact us at customerservice@macys.com & we’re happy to help.
Critical Bug fixes
Critical Bug Fixes

Never miss a sale again—create lists in the app & get email alerts whenever the price drops on your fave finds!
Love the Macy’s app? Rate it now to let us know! Questions or comments? Contact us at customerservice@macys.com & we’re happy to help.

Never miss a sale again—create lists in the app & get email alerts whenever the price drops on your fave finds!
Love the Macy’s app? Rate it now to let us know! Questions or comments? Contact us at customerservice@macys.com & we’re happy to help.

- Say hello to our new and improved Lists! It’s easier than ever to see, delete and add to your lists, manage price drop alerts and transition from your lists to your bag.
- No more price guesswork—we’ve made it easier to see the price you’ll pay after applying a promo code.
- We’ve created a helpful dashboard to check all your account info! Monitor your order status, offers, credit card balance and due date in one easy place.
- New Macy’s Star Rewards are coming—mark your calendars for October 2!
- Want to quickly share something with a friend? Just take a screen shot & share it instantly in your favorite messaging app.
Love the Macy’s app? Rate it now to let us know! Questions or comments? Contact us at customerservice@macys.com & we’re happy to help.

- We squashed some bugs that were messing with the app. You’re welcome!

- Check out in a flash with Quick Buy! Now, you can buy items directly from the product page—no need to visit your shopping bag. Plus, we'll pull in your preferred shipping & payment addresses, payment type and offers, so you can checkout in a just a few taps!

- Macy’s Star Rewards—Bigger. Better. Now for Everyone. Enjoy new rewards no matter how you pay with Star Money Days, Perks & Offers, and a Birthday Surprise.
- Send all your faves to the front! It’s easy: just update your preferences with the brands, sizes & styles you love to shop.
- Sign up for promo and security text alerts in a tap so you’re always in the know.

customerservice@macys.com & we’re happy to help.

- Shopping in store has never been easier. Use our new & improved Store Mode to scan for prices, read reviews & find out about special deals!
- Need it fast? Use the app to shop items available at your local Macy’s—then choose Free Pickup In Store to get them right away.
- Love that look? We improved our recommendations so you can find more like it.

- Do you know where your package is? We do. Keep tabs on it with order status notifications!

- Need to talk to a real person (but hate the phone)? Now you can live chat with a customer service representative during select hours.

This version includes new features such as My Stylist (available in limited locations soon), an updated integration with PayPal, and bug fixes. Be sure to download the newest version today & keep shopping with Macy’s!
'This update includes bug fixes and performance improvements to make your shopping experience even better.'

We update the app regularly to enhance your shopping experience. This latest version includes:

-Contact-Free Curbside Pickup
-Virtual Beauty Try-On
-My Room 3D
-Performance improvements
We update the app regularly to enhance your shopping experience. This latest version includes bug fixes and performance improvements.
Enjoy our latest update where we have improved our app to provide you a seamless shopping experience.

We update the app regularly to enhance your shopping experience. This latest version includes improved user experience of star money at checkout, along with bug fixes and performance improvements.

We update the app regularly to enhance your shopping experience. This latest version includes enhanced store map feature that allows you to discover key points of interest in-store, along with bug fixes and performance improvements.

In our latest update, we have elevated loyalty. If you want to know when your Star Money expires, or points needed to get to the next level, our new feature on the homepage will give you what you need as soon as you open the app. We have also fixed bugs and minor enhancements to provide you a seamless shopping experience.

In our latest update, we have elevated loyalty. If you want to know when your Star Money expires, or points needed to get to the next level, our new feature on the homepage will give you what you need as soon as you open the app. We have also fixed bugs and minor enhancements to provide you a seamless shopping experience.

Shoppers, rejoice! We’re coming in hot with useful updates that will upgrade your experience (now that’s worth a refresh).

- Easier Store Pickup: No more searching through emails—now find updates about your pickup orders right on the app’s home screen. You can quickly access your scannable barcode, plus, we’ll tell you exactly where to go when you arrive.

- Predictive text: Give your thumbs a break from entering the same info over and over again. Now you have the option to use your saved addresses, making checkout even faster. Easy-peasy.

Have feedback? We’re all ears. Leave a review so we can continue to bring you the best of Macy’s.

All for you! Here are a few updates we’re rolling out this week to enhance your app experience.

Easier returns: Change your mind? No problem. You can now initiate a return right on your Purchase History screen. 
Enhanced search: With our redesigned search, it’s now even easier to find just what you’re looking for. Plus, we’ve included a recently-viewed section so you’ll never leave an item behind.
On-the-spot price checks: Scan a tag in the app while you’re shopping in stores to see real-time prices—plus, you can see customer reviews to get the full rundown on specific styles.

Have feedback? We’re all ears. Leave a comment so we can continue to bring you the best of Macy’s.
Enjoy our latest update where we made backend bug fixes.
